articles.title: The Open: Daniel Brown leads Shane Lowry after opening day at Royal Troon as Rory McIlroy, Tiger Woods struggle
articles.description: Daniel Brown holds a one-shot lead over Shane Lowry, with Justin Thomas three strokes back in third; Bryson DeChambeau, Rory McIlroy and Tiger Woods all struggling to make the cut at Royal Troon; Watch the second round live on Friday from 6.30am on Sky Sports Golf
articles.content:
Major debutant Daniel Brown topped the leaderboard after an eventful opening round at The 152nd Open, as Shane Lowry made a fast start and Rory McIlroyâ€™s hopes suffered a setback at Royal Troon.
